annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has just finished.
Federico Palacios Martinez (RB Leipzig) has a goal ruled out for offside!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) earns the yellow card.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.
The ball is cleared after Christian Pulisic (Dortmund) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. The referee blows his whistle, Dortmund are awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.

What a great touch by Matthias Ginter (Dortmund) as he controls a fine pass into the box and takes a shot to the bottom left corner, but an opposing player makes a clearance. Great defending. The ball is out of play and Dortmund manage to earn a corner.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: There will be a minimum of 3 min. of added time.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.

Marco Reus (Dortmund) darts into the penalty area to latch on to a pass, and he unleashes a low drive towards the middle of the net, but Peter Gulacsi is alert and denies him. Corner kick. Dortmund will have an opportunity.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Oliver Burke (RB Leipzig) launches an inaccurate corner kick into the penalty area.
Oliver Burke (RB Leipzig) produces a quality cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball and spanks it away. RB Leipzig have been awarded a corner kick.
Stefan Ilsanker (RB Leipzig) jumps into a tackle and Tobias Stieler blows his whistle for a foul.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Thomas Tuchel is forced to make a change. Marcel Schmelzer is not able to carry on due to injury. He is replaced by Felix Passlack (Dortmund).

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Marcel Schmelzer (Dortmund) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.
Julian Weigl links up with Marco Reus (Dortmund), who fires just wide of the left post from the edge of the box.
Tobias Stieler blows his whistle. Sokratis (Dortmund) commits a foul after dangerous play.
Dangerous play by Federico Palacios Martinez (RB Leipzig). Tobias Stieler blows his whistle for a foul.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Marvin Compper (RB Leipzig) uses bad language while talking to the referee and receives a yellow card for dissent.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Ralph Hasenhuttl has decided to make a change. Federico Palacios Martinez (RB Leipzig) replaces Dominik Kaiser.
Marvin Compper (RB Leipzig) attempts to find one of his teammates, but puts far too much on the pass and the chance is gone.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: A substitution has been made. Raphael Guerreiro goes off and Matthias Ginter (Dortmund) comes on.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance for today's match is 81360.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Ralph Hasenhuttl prepares a substitution. Davie Selke is replaced by Oliver Burke (RB Leipzig).

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Dayotchanculle Upamecano (RB Leipzig) picks up a yellow card for a foul.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) brings his opponent down with a tackle and Tobias Stieler blows his whistle for a foul.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) takes a first time shot from the edge of the box, but his effort is well blocked by the defender.
Dominik Kaiser (RB Leipzig) serves up a nice cross, but Roman Burki punches the ball away.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Dayotchanculle Upamecano (RB Leipzig) is coming onto the pitch as Rani Khedira cannot continue after picking up an injury.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) is offside and the linesman raises his flag.
The linesman raises his flag. Davie Selke (RB Leipzig) is adjudged offside.
Dominik Kaiser (RB Leipzig) sends a teasing cross into the area, but Roman Burki intercepts the ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Thomas Tuchel is forced to make a change. Ousmane Dembele is unable to continue due to injury, Christian Pulisic (Dortmund) comes on.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.

What an amazing save by Peter Gulacsi! Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) swirls around the defenders and attempts to beat the keeper with a close range shot towards the bottom right corner, but fails.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.
A cross by Marco Reus (Dortmund) from the side of the pitch flies into the box, but fails to find its intended target as the aim was poor.
Dominik Kaiser (RB Leipzig) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
Yussuf Poulsen (RB Leipzig) shows too much aggression while trying to break free from his opponent and the referee blows his whistle for a foul.
The ball is cleared after Marco Reus (Dortmund) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
Tobias Stieler interrupts the game for a tactical foul by Stefan Ilsanker (RB Leipzig).
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang slides a brilliant pass into Marco Reus (Dortmund), but his shot from inside the box goes a whisker wide of the right post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Dominik Kaiser (RB Leipzig) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.
A cross from Rani Khedira (RB Leipzig) fails to reach the box as the defence clears the ball away to safety. The ball goes out of play. RB Leipzig are awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marcel Schmelzer (Dortmund) attempts to find a teammate with the corner, but the effort is snuffed out by the goalkeeper.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) swings in a cross, but the ball is cleared to safety by one of the defending players. The linesman makes the right call and Dortmund will have a corner.
Davie Selke (RB Leipzig) delivers a long ball, but it lacks enough power to reach his teammates and is intercepted by one of the defenders.
The ball is cleared after Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.
Stefan Ilsanker (RB Leipzig) commits a foul after bringing down his opponent with a slide tackle.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle to signal the start of the second half.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle for half time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.
Tobias Stieler blows his whistle and it's Marco Reus (Dortmund) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 1 additional min. will be played.
Dominik Kaiser (RB Leipzig) sends over a free kick from long range but the defence is alert.
Willi Orban (RB Leipzig) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out.
Marcel Halstenberg (RB Leipzig) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
Dominik Kaiser (RB Leipzig) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
Rani Khedira (RB Leipzig) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
Flag goes up against Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) and the referee blows his whistle for offside. The referee blows his whistle for offside.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Ousmane Dembele produces a brilliant lofted pass and Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) gets on the end of it to finish with a header into an empty net. The score is 1:0.

Chance! Ousmane Dembele sends a brilliant curling cross into the heart of the defence and into the path of Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund), whose header from the centre of the box goes a whisker over the bar.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) attempts to find the head of one of his teammates with a promising cross into the box, but a defender outjumps the attackers and averts the threat.
Flag up against Davie Selke (RB Leipzig). He had space to move into behind the defence, but he went too soon.
Rani Khedira (RB Leipzig) brings an opponent down and Tobias Stieler interrupts the game.

Willi Orban (RB Leipzig) is strong enough to get to the ball and produces a header from close range. Even though the header was directed to the left side of the goal, Roman Burki didn't have a hard time stopping the attempt as it wasn't powerful enough.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Naby Keita (RB Leipzig) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.
Julian Weigl (Dortmund) trips an opponent with a slide tackle. Tobias Stieler stops the game and he could give him a card, but eventually decides on just a warning.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Bernardo (RB Leipzig) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Tobias Stieler didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.
Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.
Naby Keita (RB Leipzig) is penalised after knocking an opponent down.
Sokratis (Dortmund) was too fierce in his attempt to get the ball from his opponent and Tobias Stieler blows for a foul.
Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) holds his opponent to prevent him from getting the ball and the referee blows for a foul after seeing the whole situation.
Davie Selke (RB Leipzig) pulls the shirt of his opponent and only escapes without punishment due to the benevolence of the referee.
Rani Khedira (RB Leipzig) pulls the jersey of one of the opposition players and Tobias Stieler blows his whistle for a foul.
A pass by Marcel Halstenberg (RB Leipzig) ends up in no man's land, and the attacking effort comes to an end.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang sends a lofted pass into the box, Ousmane Dembele (Dortmund) shows good awareness to connect with it but drags his shot well wide of the left post.
Dominik Kaiser (RB Leipzig) takes the free kick and attempts to find some of his teammates inside the box, but the ball is intercepted and cleared out of danger.
Marcel Schmelzer (Dortmund) brings his opponent down. Tobias Stieler has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle for a foul.
Julian Weigl (Dortmund) knocks his opponent down with an over the top tackle.
Tobias Stieler blows his whistle as Marco Reus (Dortmund) used excessive force in the tackle during an attack.
Naby Keita (RB Leipzig) makes a rough challenge and Tobias Stieler blows his whistle for a foul.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Raphael Guerreiro (Dortmund) decides to take a short corner instead of crossing into the box.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) collects a pass and finds himself in a good position to strike from the edge of the box, but his attempt is blocked. It will be a corner kick for Dortmund.
Erik Durm (Dortmund) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) is flagged for offside.
Davie Selke (RB Leipzig) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
The ball is cleared after Yussuf Poulsen (RB Leipzig) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Here we go, today's match is starting right now.
RB Leipzig will kick off.
Let us introduce today's referee to you, and it's Tobias Stieler.

annotations.description: You can have a look at the starting XIs of both teams in the details of this match.

Dortmund have not lost for 3 games in a row.
